ComicInfo.Series: Escape of the Living Dead: Airborne
ComicInfo.Summary: Gore cover by Jeremy Rock; Deadhead and Shocker covers by Mike Wolfer. All other covers by Dheeraj Verma. Cover variants for this issue include: regular; bad day; bodycount; dead head; gold & platinum foils; gore; splatterstock; terror; sketch cover; wraparoundAirborne: 1971: It's been three years since the blood-soaked night that the dead rose from their graves, attacking and devouring the living. Now, the legacy of that horrific and unexplained event is about to be unleashed once again upon an unsuspecting world... But this time, there may be no escape for those in the terrifying clutches of the cannibalistic, living dead! Hidden within the concrete walls of a secret medical research lab, someone has been studying the last remaining undead remnants of the marauding zombie army.
ComicInfo.Title: Airborne
